plot: "Beer Buddies" is the story of six professional chefs who come from different parts of Canada. Together, they create recipes that involve the ingredient of beer including appetizers, entrées and desserts.
plot_en: "Beer Buddies" is the story of six professional chefs who come from different parts of Canada. Together, they create recipes that involve the ingredient of beer including appetizers, entrées and desserts.
plot_es: "Beer Buddies" is the story of six professional chefs who come from different parts of Canada. Together, they create recipes that involve the ingredient of beer including appetizers, entrées and desserts.
title: Beer Buddies
